meanings.definition: Make or become thinner, especially in a way that is attractive or healthy.
meanings.sent1: She slimmed down for her wedding dress fitting.
meanings.sent2: After exercising regularly, he slimmed his waistline.
meanings.sent3: The cat slimmed down to fit through the tiny cat door.
meanings.sent4: The budget slimmed down after cutting unnecessary expenses.
meanings.sent5: The artist slimmed the brush strokes to create a delicate painting.

meanings.definition: Reduce the size or amount of something.
meanings.sent1: He slimmed the font size to fit more text on the page.
meanings.sent2: The company slimmed its product line to focus on core items.
meanings.sent3: The magician slimmed the deck of cards to perform a trick.
meanings.sent4: She slimmed the clutter in her room by donating old clothes.
meanings.sent5: The chef slimmed the recipe to make it easier for beginners.
